members.name: DelayNode()
members.description: Creates a new instance of an DelayNode object.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: Options are as follows: delayTime: The initial delay time for the node. The default is 0. maxDelayTime: The maximum delay time for the node. The default is 1.

members.name: DelayNode.delayTime
members.description: Is an a-rate AudioParam representing the amount of delay to apply.
